text: Tung Chee-hwa, GBM (; born 7 July 1937) is a Shanghai-born Hong Kong businessman and politician. He was the first Chief Executive of Hong Kong after the transfer of sovereignty on 1 July 1997 to 12 March 2005. He is currently a vice-chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC). ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Chief Executives of Hong Kong Category:Chinese businesspeople
title: Tung Chee-hwa
